email: This field must be a valid email
onlyLetters: This field must contain only letters
onlyNumbers: This field must contain only numbers
minLetters: This field must be at least {min} letters
minLettersLow: This field must be at least {min} letters
minSymbols: This field must be at least {min} symbols
minNumbers: This field must be at least {min} numbers
maxSymbols: This field must be at most {max} symbols
maxNumbers: This field must be at most {max} numbers
onlyLettersAndNumbers: This field must contain only letters and numbers
minCharacters: This field must be at least {min} characters
lowCase: Password must contain lower case letters
upperCase: Password must contain upper case letters
digit: Password must contain at least one digit
